LanguageData.Mutant_Ogre.label: Mutant
LanguageData.Mutant_Ogre.description: Originally designed for construction and heavy industry, the Ogron™ is a large, tough, thickheaded xenohuman. In rimworld condition, Many feral clans use them as brutal war beasts.
LanguageData.Mutant_Ogre.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Mutant_Ogre.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.Mutant_Ogre.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.Mutant_Ogre_Leather.label: Mutant leather
LanguageData.Mutant_Ogre_Corpse.label: Mutant corpse
